meanings.definition: A thin sheet of material, such as paper or plastic, with a design or letters cut out, used to produce the design or letters on a surface below by applying pigment through the cut-out holes.
meanings.sent1: I used stencils to create pretty patterns on my notebook cover.
meanings.sent2: Artists often use stencils to add intricate details to their paintings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat walked over the stencils, leaving paw prints all over my work!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, leaving behind a trail of stencils in the air.
meanings.sent5: The stencils allowed me to easily replicate the same design multiple times.

meanings.definition: To produce a design or letters on a surface using a stencil.
meanings.sent1: She stencils beautiful flowers on the walls of her room.
meanings.sent2: He carefully stencils his name on each of his tools for identification.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully stencils smiley faces on the frothy cappuccinos.
meanings.sent4: His words stenciled a vivid image of the past in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist stencils the intricate pattern with precision and skill.
